vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μᾰταιότης, ητος, ἡ,
vanity, purposelessness, ματαιότης ματαιοτήτων [LXX+1st c.AD+]; folly, ἀνθρώπων [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
emptiness, futility, frustration
vanity, folly, futility, from the Hebrew, religious error, Eph. 4:17; 2Pet. 2:18; false religion, Rom. 8:20*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 虛空, 徒勞, 無目的, 短暫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 虚空, 徒劳, 无目的, 短暂
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự rỗng tuếch; sự hư ảo; sự vô ích
